lead_paragraph: At least two attackers were killed when they entered an Indian air force base near the border with Pakistan and exchanged fire with security forces.

headline.print_headline: Asia; India: Gunmen Attack Air Base

snippet: At least two attackers were killed when they entered an Indian air force base near the border with Pakistan and exchanged fire with security forces.
abstract: Shootout between security forces and four gunmen at Indian Air Force base near country's restive border with Pakistan leaves two assailants dead; India has accused Pakistan of supporting insurgents in area, claim denied by Pakistan.
